## PassState.framebuffer property

The framebuffer to render to. This framebuffer is used unless a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md) or [ClearCommand](./toygl.clearcommand.md) explicitly define a framebuffer, which is used for off-screen rendering.

**Signature:**

```typescript
framebuffer: Framebuffer;
```
